name: Haha, so very true! I am spoiled. I do have some use cases for faster than 35 Mbps upstream, notably remote access to my Plex server when on the road, and I want to Direct Play full-quality Blu-Ray. That said, I have a cloud-hosted Plex server for that anyway.

content.html: Haha, so very true! I am spoiled. I do have some use cases for faster than 35 Mbps upstream, notably remote access to my Plex server when on the road, and I want to Direct Play full-quality Blu-Ray. That said, I have a cloud-hosted Plex server for that anyway.
